name: Sewing Machine for Beginners, Mini Sewing Machine for Kids & Adults with Large Extension Table, LED Light, 2 Speed Foot Pedal, DIY Home Sewing Kit with 127 Accessories(Cyan)
short_description: 【Safe＆Easy to Use】 This beginners sewing machine features a modern design that helps safeguard beginners' fingers from getting hurt. With its intuitive on/off switch and adjustable dual-speed settings, you can easily customize your sewing experience. The included user manual and video guides make it simple for everyone in the family to get started with sewing. 【Versatile Desigin】 This robust sewing machine for kids and adults features multiple functions, including automatic bobbin rewinding and a built-in thread cutter. Its special cuff slot simplifies sewing sleeves and trouser legs. It effortlessly handles 4 layers of denim with its dual-line, knot-free stitching design for exceptional stitching results. Ideal for kids and beginners to kickstart their sewing journey. 【Complete Accessory Kit】 Our adults and kids sewing machine comes with a comprehensive 127-piece accessory kit,including 50 printed fabrics,1 box Of needles,32 spools of thread ,32 pre-filled bobbins,4 bobbins, measuring tape, scissors, thimble, needle threader, power adapter, foot deal,and instructions.Never worry about missing sewing accessories again. 【Extension Table & LED Light】 This mini sewing machine comes with an extension table that provides stability, making it easier to create clothing, jeans, pillows, DIY dolls, and more! Plus, the built-in security light ensures clear visibility in low-light conditions, making it ideal for daily sewing tasks, whether for sewing for kids ages 8-12 or for various family sewing projects. 【Compact & Great Present Choice】 Our mini sewing machine comes fully packaged, its compact design makes it easy to store and transport, while its practicality and versatility make it an excellent gift choice for sewing enthusiasts of all levels, especially as sewing machine beginner.

name: Brother CE1155 Computerized Sewing Machine, 110 Built-in Stitches, LCD Display, 7 Included Feet
short_description: Brother Sustainability: The Brother CE1155 Sewing Machine features an outer cover that is made with 50% recycled plastic*, and is packaged with recycled cardboard and no Styrofoam. Durable Metal Frame Construction: The durable metal frame and quality construction allow your machine to tackle any project, from thick denim to heavy quilts. 110 Unique Built-in Stitches: Includes 110 built-in stitches, including utility, decorative, and heirloom stitches, and 8 auto-size buttonholes. Improved Needle Threader: Easier than ever to use, the needle threader reliably pushes the thread through the needle. Computerized Speed Control and Start/Stop Button: The Speed Control feature lets you easily adjust the stitch speed by hand for tricky curves and detailed execution. Enjoy hands-free sewing with flexible adaptive controls, including two ways to use the Start/Stop button: the foot pedal and the hand control. Included Accessories: The CE1155 comes with the accessories you need to get started, including 7 sewing feet: a Buttonhole Foot, Zipper Foot, Button Sewing Foot, Overcasting Foot, Blind Stitch Foot, Monogramming Foot, and Zigzag Foot. Large Needle-to-Arm Workspace: The CE1155's small footprint makes it the ideal sewing machine for apartments or studios while its generous needle-to-arm space allows users to work on large projects.
product_description: The CE1155 computerized sewing machine features a wide array of professional features in a portable, lightweight package perfect for beginners or anyone looking to conquer their sewing needs. With an eye-pleasing cosmetic, durable aluminum frame, and small footprint, the CE1155 will look great in any apartment, loft, or studio. With 110 unique built-in sewing stitches, including 8 styles of 1-step auto-size buttonholes, the CE1155 will have you creating in no time. The CE1155 also features an automatic needle threader that perfectly pushes thread through the needle and a convenient, jam-resistant drop-in top bobbin. Enjoy flexible, adaptive controls that provide two ways to start/stop the machine: a choice of the foot pedal or the hand control. The Speed Control feature lets you easily adjust the stitch speed for tricky curves and detailed execution. The pre-set speed control enables the user to set a maximum sewing speed of 410spm—a great safety feature! Selecting your stitch is as easy as pressing a button with the easy stitch selector and LCD display. The CE1155 features a super bright LED-lit workspace, which provides enhanced visibility and reduces eye strain during long sewing sessions. The smaller free arm makes sewing cuffs, skinny jeans, sleeves, and other cylindrical items easier! This machine is packed with accessories, including 7 sewing feet: the Buttonhole foot, Zipper Foot, Button Sewing Foot, Overcasting Foot, Blind Stitch Foot, Monogramming Foot, and Zigzag Foot. With an array of excellent features, a small sewing footprint, and a valuable warranty, the portable and lightweight Brother CE1155 computerized sewing machine is ideal for a beginning sewist or advanced maker. *Environmental Claim Validation Procedure (ECVP) for Recycled Content, UL ECVP 2809-2, Second Edition, dated June 20, 2024. Recycled Content is defined in accordance with ISO 14021.

name: Handheld Sewing Machine,Hand Sewing Machine, Dual Electric Power Mode,Easy to Learn, and Kit for Beginners, Can be Used at Home or Outdoors to Sew Clothes Quickly Anytime, Anywhere, （White）
short_description: Upgraded Handle Design: This mini sewing machine features an enlarged handle, making it more comfortable to use and preventing hand fatigue caused by a small handle. Its size is 1.9 x 8.3 x 4.7 inches, making it ideal for everyday home use and convenient for travel. Multi-functional Portable Sewing Machine: This handheld sewing machine is compatible with a variety of fabrics, with a maximum thickness of 1.5mm. Whether it’s cotton, linen, wool, silk, blended fabrics, or denim, it can handle them all, making it a must-have tool for home repairs and travel. Monofilament Sewing Design: This machine uses a monofilament design, requiring you to tie a knot after sewing to prevent the thread from coming undone easily, ensuring more secure stitches. Dual Power Supply Options: You can choose between two power supply modes: 4 AA batteries (not included) or USB power. Please switch to the appropriate power mode before turning on the machine for flexible use Two-Speed Adjustment: With two-speed settings, the first gear is slower, ideal for sewing fabric corners and detailed areas, while the second gear is faster, perfect for straight-line stitching, helping you finish your tasks more efficiently. Each package includes a test cloth for your convenience to check if the machine is working properly upon unboxing.

short_description: 60 UNIQUE BUILT-IN STITCHES: The Brother CS5055 sewing machine includes 60 built-in stitches including utility, decorative and heirloom stitch functions, and 7 1-step auto-size buttonholes IMPROVED NEEDLE THREADER: Easier than ever to use, the automatic needle threader reliably pushes the thread through the needle. The convenient, jam resistant drop-in top bobbin easy to load and helps ensure your bobbin stays in place INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: The CS5055 includes 7 sewing feet, 4 bobbins, a needle set, a trilingual English/Spanish/French user manual and more METAL FRAME and FIXED NEEDLE BAR: The durable metal frame construction allows your machine to tackle any project, and the needle is fixed in place while you work, allowing for cleaner stitching and even lines LARGE NEEDLE-TO-ARM WORKSPACE: A larger workspace with increased width in needle-to-arm space allows users to work on larger projects sale voids the wThis product is intended for sale only in the US at 120 volts, and any other use or sale may void the warranty.arranty.
product_description: The CS5055 computerized sewing machine is the perfect package for beginners and seasoned sewing enthusiasts alike. With an LCD display screen, choose from a range of 60 built-in decorative stitches including 7 styles of auto-size buttonholes to add embellished, personal touches to your wardrobe. Experience virtually effortless sewing on denim, tweed, and other thick fabrics with the exceptional feed system. A fixed needle bar limits movement while sewing for cleaner finishing and an advanced needle threading system that makes threading easy. Complete with a fast bobbin winding system, Quick-Set bobbin, and super bright LED-lit work area, the CS5055 will help you turn clothing into fashion masterpieces in no time.

name: Handheld Sewing Machine, Easy to Use Portable Electric Mini Sewing Machines for Beginners with Two Speeds, with Complete Accessories Kit, Suitable for Home, Travel and DIY
short_description: Easy to Use Portable Mini Sewing Machine---This is specially designed for beginners, and is suitable for quick repairs and sewing enthusiasts doing creative projects at home. Upgrade with new technology, increase power, reduce noise, simple operation, diverse functions, light weight, durable. It is more convenient, and saves more time than a traditional bench sewing machine. This item is designed with a mini size (8.6" in length, 4.6" in height), Easy one-handed operation Dual Power Supply Mode---Our mini sewing machine offers two convenient power options: you can choose to use 4 AA batteries (not included) or USB (included), depending on your preference. 4 AA batteries is suitable for on-site maintenance and emergency sewing when you are on the go or on the go, provides usb interface for convenient use at home. This flexibility ensures energy-efficient and reliable performance wherever you are with your portable sewing machine Dual Sewing Speed---The electric handheld sewing machine has two speeds, slow and fast. 2 adjustable speeds, slow for fine work and harder edges, fast for faster results and more efficient sewing. The double thread design makes the stitching stronger and ending sewing easier, meets the basic sewing needs of most households Wide Range of Applications---Our mini sewing machine can handle fabrics up to 1.5 millimeters thick, For example: clothing, silk, curtains, pillowcases, muppets and toys etc. It is easy to store, making it ideal for home use or travel. Even beginners can easily get started, making it your creative partner on-the-go, allowing you to enjoy the joy of sewing Full Set of Accessories---Our handheld sewing machine comes with a full set of sewing accessories, including a variety of loops, replacement needles, needle threader, needle clips, tape measure, scissors, etc. As well as a reserved battery compartment and USB cable to ensure continuous and stable power supply, which will allow you to cope with different sewing requirements during the sewing process, You can set it up in no time and start sewing your projects immediately Quick & Easy Operation---No complex setup! This beginner-friendly handheld sewing machine features a simple, one-button operation. Just insert thread, press the button, and sew instantly—The portable sewing machine comes with clear instructions and is designed for easy ideal for beginners and busy lifestyles Warm Tips---Please note that the sewing machine is not second-hand goods!!!! Each sewing machine comes with a test cloth when it leaves the factory, which is used to test whether the machine's working condition can be used normally. It is also convenient that you can practice in advance before sewing clothes
